price: (Musa) aravuga ati “Nagikoze ubwo nari mu bayobye”,
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
